column4: Im sorry, maybe you missed some of that.  My home dir is inconcequential haha.
I installed ubuntu breezy badger last night having no clue that it was just released.  Which is always a bad idea
Oh, it seems that way.  but I was talking with John Dong earlier today about "backports" and he made me convince myself that I should try out Hoary
sso... now I am talking to you fine folks from a Hoary install
I honestly dont care so much which version I am running.  I just need to get some packages from the restricted repos
paste your sources.list somewhere on pastebin
can you paste me a sources.list?
my sources are for breezy now ;)
thank you again for that link you sent me:)
